plugin.name: Infinispan
plugin.description: Supports management and monitoring of Infinispan

operation.name: startCacheWithCacheName
operation.displayName: Starts a cache with the given name
operation.description: Starts a named cache from this cache manager

operation.name: startCache
operation.description: Starts the default cache associated with this cache manager

metric.displayName: Number of total number of bytes written
metric.description: Returns the total number of bytes written by the server back to clients which includes both protocol and user information.
Returns the host to which the transport binds.
Returns the receive buffer size.
Returns whether TCP no delay was configured or not.
Returns the idle timeout.
Returns the send buffer size.
Returns the number of worker threads.
Returns the port to which the transport binds.

metric.displayName: Number of total number of bytes read
metric.description: Returns the total number of bytes read by the server from clients which includes both protocol and user information.
The name of this cache manager
Infinispan version.
The total number of created caches, including the default cache.
The physical network addresses associated with this instance
Size of the cluster in number of nodes
The total number of running caches, including the default cache.
The status of the cache manager instance.
The network address associated with this instance
The defined cache names and their statuses. The default cache is not included in this representation.
The total number of defined caches, excluding the default cache.
List of members in the cluster

operation.name: DistributionManager.locateKey
operation.description: Locates an object in a cluster. Only works with String keys.

operation.name: DistributionManager.isAffectedByRehash
operation.displayName: [DistributionManager] Could key be affected by rehash?
operation.description: Determines whether a given key is affected by an ongoing rehash, if any.

operation.name: DistributionManager.isLocatedLocally
operation.description: Tells you whether a given key is local to this instance of the cache. Only works with String keys.

operation.name: Invalidation.setStatisticsEnabled
operation.description: Enable/disable statistics

c:simple-property.name: enabled
c:simple-property.description: Whether statistics should be enabled or disabled (true/false)

operation.name: Invalidation.resetStatistics
operation.description: Resets statistics gathered by this component

operation.name: Cache.stop
operation.description: Stops the cache.

operation.name: Cache.start
operation.description: Starts the cache.

operation.name: RpcManager.setStatisticsEnabled
operation.description: Enable/disable statistics

c:simple-property.name: enabled
c:simple-property.description: Whether statistics should be enabled or disabled (true/false)

operation.name: RpcManager.resetStatistics
operation.description: Resets statistics gathered by this component

operation.name: GMUDistributionManager.locateKey
operation.description: Locates an object in a cluster. Only works with String keys.

operation.name: GMUDistributionManager.isAffectedByRehash
operation.displayName: [GMUDistributionManager] Could key be affected by rehash?
operation.description: Determines whether a given key is affected by an ongoing rehash, if any.

operation.name: GMUDistributionManager.isLocatedLocally
operation.description: Tells you whether a given key is local to this instance of the cache. Only works with String keys.

operation.name: Passivation.resetStatistics
operation.description: Resets statistics gathered by this component
